articles.title: Boy Scouts Of America Reaches Historic Settlement With Sexual Abuse Survivors - NPR
articles.description: "This initial settlement of $850 million is the largest settlement of sexual abuse claims in United States history," Ken Rothweiler, who represents more than 16,000 men in the settlement said.
articles.content: The Boy Scouts of America has reached a settlement with scores of men who say they were abused while they were in scouting. The deal has been presented to a federal court hearing the Boy Scouts' bank… [+3420 chars]

articles.author: Nitin Sharma
articles.title: Youngest Grandmaster Abhimanyu is a Kasparov trainee, Potter newbie - The Indian Express
articles.description: The American 12-year-old, born to Indian parents originally from Agra and Bhopal, might be one of the rarest pre-teens to start a Harry Potter, but get weaned away from the book for something slightly more important - to create chess history.
